title: France panorama. [No. 72/34]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: The Atlantic race - “Pen Duick IV” and “Friday 13th”. Painting and fashions - experts in color. 2. 150th anniversary of photography - one and a half centuries of evolution. 3. Flax - monograph of an industry. 4. International art house - 150 apartment-workshops for artists from all over the world.
